questions.title: Image Optimization
questions.content: How do you optimize images for web performance?

questions.codeBlock:
<!-- Inline critical CSS -->
<style>
  .header {
    background: #333;
  }
  .hero {
    padding: 2rem;
  }
  .nav {
    display: flex;
  }
</style>

<!-- Load non-critical CSS asynchronously -->
<link
  rel="preload"
  href="styles.css"
  as="style"
  onload="this.onload=null;this.rel='stylesheet'"
/>
<noscript><link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css" /></noscript>
questions.content: How do you optimize CSS for better performance?
